rutils 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

WebDetailsCacheManager class

Source: R/utils.R
WebDetailsCacheManager.Rd

WebDetailsCacheManager class

WebDetailsCacheManager class

Details

A manager for multiple WebDetailsCache objects.

Public fields

caches

List of WebDetailsCache objects.

cache_dir

Directory for cache files.

log_dir

Directory for log files.

Methods

Public methods

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$new()

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$add_cache()

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$build_cache()

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$build_cache_threaded()

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$clear()

  • WebDetailsCacheManager$clone()

Method new()

initialize a new WebDetailsCacheManager.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$new(cache_dir = "cache", log_dir = "logs")

Arguments

cache_dir

Directory to store cache files (default "cache").

log_dir

Directory for log files (default "logs").

Method add_cache()

Add a new cache to the manager.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$add_cache(
  cache_name,
  list_all_entries_url,
  key_field_extraction_func,
  single_entry_details_url,
  flush_threshold = 100,
  list_all_entries_page_size = 1000
)

Arguments

cache_name

Unique name for the cache.

list_all_entries_url

URL for listing all entries. Expected to accept a query parameter list with page_size and return JSON containing:

  • next: the next URL in the paginated results

  • count: the number of results

  • results: the list of entries

key_field_extraction_func

Function to extract the key field from each entry in the results.

single_entry_details_url

URL template for fetching details of a single entry. Must include a placeholder {entry_key} that will be replaced by the actual key.

flush_threshold

Number of entry_details to process before flushing to disk (default 100).

list_all_entries_page_size

Number of entries per page (default 1000).

Method build_cache()

Build caches for all managed WebDetailsCache objects.

Iterates through each cache and builds it.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$build_cache()

Method build_cache_threaded()

Build caches in parallel.

Processes each cache in parallel and returns a list of results. Set up a per-cache log file in the worker.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$build_cache_threaded()

Method clear()

Clear all managed caches.

Removes all caches from memory.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$clear()

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

WebDetailsCacheManager$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
